# Driatheli Group SRL - XEH.ro (eXpert Echipamente Horeca)

> Authorized distributor of professional HoReCa equipment in Romania.
> Brands: RM Gastro, REDFOX. Serving restaurants, hotels, catering since 2009.

## Company
- [About Us](https://www.xeh.ro/despre-noi)
- [Contact](https://www.xeh.ro/contact)
- [Team](https://www.xeh.ro/echipa)

## Product Catalog
- [Full Catalog](https://www.xeh.ro/catalog): 2600+ professional HoReCa equipment
- [RM Gastro](https://www.xeh.ro/rm): Premium brand equipment
- [REDFOX](https://www.xeh.ro/redfox): Economic brand equipment
